message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $110. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of value out of it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $105 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a good deal on this product. Let me know if that works for you.
